name: Unchecked Power
text: Destroy all territories, and units and territory improvements on those territories. Each player draws and plays three more territories.

name: Guerrilla Warfare
text: When a hidden unit is revealed it gets +1 power and preemptive strike.

name: Restricted Supply Routes
text: Production cards can't be expended this turn.

name: Silence
text: Suppress target card until that player's next turn.

name: Thought Shatter
text: Prevent target Action or Reaction card.

name: Veto
text: Prevent target Edict, Action or Territory improvement.

name: Backstreet Informer
text: When this unit moves to a City or Village territory you may reveal a hidden card there. If you do draw a card.

name: Subversive Saboteur
text:
Hidden (1 Mana) Reveal ((2))
When this Unit is revealed deal twice X damage to an adjacent territory improvement, or X damage to an adjacent Unit, where X is this unit's power.

name: Targen, In the Know
text:
Hidden (1 Mana) Reveal ((2) 1 Mana)
When you reveal this card, draw X cards where X is the number of hidden cards you control
When you play a card Hidden on a territory draw a card, do this once per territory.

name: Shield wall
text: Units at target territory take no physical damage this skirmish.
